content: Does anyone know whom to ping to get https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/pull/4368 reviewed? This blocks a PR that would be great to have in time for the beta.
It's going to be hard to land a clippy upgrade in time I imagine

It's going to be hard to land a clippy upgrade in time I imagine

well yeah if tiny clippy PRs take >2 days to land then it will be :/
I was referring to the in-tree breakage I'd expect (presuming others have landed also)
but I didn't expect the clippy side to be the problem^^
well I guess the lint will just make its way to beta one release later... I'll survive that, probably ;)
